name: Ultrascan Medical Diagnostic Imaging - New Hamburg
comment:
Diagnostic imaging clinic

Services include:
  • ultrasound - musculoskeletal, vascular, general, and neonatal
  • bone mineral densitometry (BMD) testing
  • mammography
  • ontario breast screening program
  • x-ray - no appointments required for this service
